Name.BusinessNameLine1: MOTHER OF PERPETUAL HELP RESIDENCE INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: A RESIDENTIAL CARE FACILILTY THAT PROVIDES ASSISTED LIVING TO ITS ELDERLY RESIDENTS.
IRS990.MissionDescription: CARDINAL RITTER SENIOR SERVICES (CRSS) PROVIDES SERVICES TO IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF LIFE FOR SENIOR ADULTS BY PROMOTING AND PROVIDING SOCIAL, HEALTH, AND HOUSING PROGRAMS AND SERVICES IN ST. LOUIS CITY AND COUNTY, AS WELL AS IN ST. CHARLES, JEFFERSON, FRANKLIN AND WARREN COUNTIES. INSPIRED BY THE TEACHINGS OF JESUS CHRIST, THE MISSION OF CRSS IS TO BE A RECOGNIZED PROVIDER OF FIRST CHOICE IN HEALTHCARE AND SUPPORTIVE SOCIAL SERVICES FOR SENIOR ADULTS THROUGHOUT THE ARCHDIOCESE OF ST. LOUIS.
IRS990.Description: OPERATION OF 80 UNIT ASSISTED LIVING FACILITY OFFERING 24-HOUR STAFFING, ALL MEALS, ACTIVITIES, AND DAILY MASS.

NameBusiness.BusinessNameLine1: ARCHDIOCESE OF ST LOUIS FINANCE OFFICE

Form990ScheduleLPartIV.Relationship: MEMBER OF FRANCISCAN SISTERS OF OUR LADY OF PERPETUAL HELP
Form990ScheduleLPartIV.DescriptionOfTransaction: THE ORGANIZATION HAS AN AGREEMENT WITH THE FRANCISCAN SISTERS OF OUR LADY OF PERPETUAL HELP (CONGREGATION) IN WHICH THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES THE CONGREGATION WITH A MINIMUM OF 20 UNITS AT SPECIFIED RATES FOR USED AND UNUSED UNITS. THE AGREEMENT EXPIRES IN MAY 2010 AND CONTAINS 3 RENEWAL OPTIONS, EACH FOR A 5 YEAR PERIOD.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 3
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: CARDINAL RITTER SENIOR SERVICES (CRSS) PERIODICALLY PROVIDES THE ORGANIZATION WITH CERTAIN MANAGEMENT SERVICES. CRSS PAYS VENDORS THROUGH THE MANAGEMENT AGENT'S DISBURSEMENT SYSTEM FOR THE ORGANIZATION. THIS PROCEDURE WAS IMPLEMENTED FOR THE PURPOSE OF UTILIZING THE MOST COST EFFECTIVE METHOD TO CONSERVE THE ORGANIZATION'S PROCESSING COSTS AND TO PROVIDE INTERNAL CONTROLS TO SAFEGUARD ASSETS. THERE IS NO PAYMENT TO THE MANAGING AGENT FOR THIS CASH DISBURSEMENT SYSTEM. ADDITIONALLY, MOTHER OF PERPETUAL HELP RECEIVES SERVICES FROM 6 EMPLOYEES THAT ARE SHARED BETWEEN SEVERAL RELATED ORGANIZATIONS. THE FEDERAL W-2 FORMS ARE ISSUED BY THE RELATED ORGANIZATIONS AND MOTHER OF PERPETUAL HELP REIMBURSES THE RELATED ORGANIZATIONS BASED ON AN ALLOCATION PERCENTAGE SET FORTH BY MANAGEMENT. ALSO, MOTHER OF PERPETUAL HELP PAYS MANAGEMENT AND BOOKKEEPING FEES TO THE ARCHDIOCESE OF ST. LOUIS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 6
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION HAS ONE MEMBER - CARDINAL RITTER SENIOR SERVICES (CRSS). ADDITIONALLY, CATHOLIC CHARITIES OF ST. LOUIS (CATHOLIC CHARITIES) IS A MEMBER WITH RESERVED POWERS OVER CRSS, BY WHICH CATHOLIC CHARITIES HAS RESERVED POWERS OVER THE ORGANIZATION. THE ARCHBISHOP OF ST. LOUIS IS A MEMBER WITH RESERVED POWERS OVER CATHOLIC CHARITIES, BY WHICH THE ARCHBISHOP ALSO HAS RESERVED POWERS OVER THE ORGANIZATION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: AS A MEMBER WITH RESERVED POWERS OVER CATHOLIC CHARITIES OF ST. LOUIS, BY WHICH THE ARCHBISHOP OF ST. LOUIS ALSO HAS RESERVED POWERS OVER THE ORGANIZATION, THE ARCHBISHOP OF ST. LOUIS HAS THE AUTHORITY TO ELECT AND/OR APPROVE PERSONS TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE ORGANIZATION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7b
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: AS THEY ARE MEMBERS WITH RESERVED POWERS, VARIOUS DECISIONS OF THE ORGANIZATION ARE SUBJECT TO APPROVAL BY CARDINAL RITTER SENIOR SERVICES, CATHOLIC CHARITIES OF ST. LOUIS, AND THE ARCHBISHOP OF ST. LOUIS. ADDITIONALLY, THE ARCHDIOCESE OF ST. LOUIS IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE SELECTION OF THE INDEPENDENT AUDITOR FOR ALL ARCHDIOCESAN ENTITIES. HOWEVER, THE CRSS FINANCE COMMITTEE RECOMMENDS APPROVAL OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS TO THE CRSS GOVERNING BOARD.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION HAS PROVIDED A .PDF COPY OF THE FORM 990 TO THE MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BOARD VIA EMAIL PRIOR TO FILING OF THE TAX RETURN. THE EMAIL SENT TO THE GOVERNING BOARD REQUESTS THAT ALL MEMBERS REVIEW THE FORM 990 AS OF A SELECT DATE. ANY QUESTIONS AND COMMENTS ARE TO BE SENT TO THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER. ONCE ALL QUESTIONS AND COMMENTS ARE REVIEWED/CLEARED BY THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER, THE FORM 990 IS ACCEPTED FOR FILING AND A REPRESENTATION LETTER IS SIGNED BY THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER. AT THIS POINT, THE FORM 990 IS FILED WITH THE IRS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: UPON MEMBERSHIP TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS, PERSONS ARE REQUIRED TO REVIEW AND SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. ADDITIONALLY, ALL OTHER OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, AND KEY EMPLOYEES ARE REQUIRED TO REVIEW AND SIGN THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION REVIEWS A SALARY ADMINISTRATION PROGRAM, INCLUDING PAY GRADES AND RANGES, THAT IS PROVIDED BY CATHOLIC CHARITIES OF ST. LOUIS. ADDITIONALLY, THE ST. LOUIS AREA SALARY SURVEY REPORT ISSUED ANNUALLY BY THE AAIM MANAGEMENT ASSOCIATION IS REVIEWED WHEN PREPARING SALARY BUDGETS FOR THE FISCAL YEAR. THE ORGANIZATION ALSO REVIEWS NATIONAL AND LOCAL INFLATION RATES, INTERNAL FUNDING ABILITIES, AND PLANNED SALARY BUDGETS FOR THE ARCHDIOCESE OF ST. LOUIS. ANNUAL PERFORMANCE EVALUATIONS ARE ALSO REVIEWED WHEN DETERMINING SALARY INCREASES.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ANYONE INTERESTED IN REVIEWING THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND/OR FINANCIAL STATEMENTS MUST CONTACT THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER, AS THIS INFORMATION IS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Contact Addresses for Officers, Directors, Etc
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: BRIAN O'MALLEY - 4532 LINDELL BLVD., ST. LOUIS, MO 63108. JOHN LALLY - 4532 LINDELL BLVD., ST. LOUIS, MO 63108. MSGR. MARK ULLRICH - 4532 LINDELL BLVD., ST. LOUIS, MO 63108.

NameOfDisregardedEntity.BusinessNameLine1: CARDINAL RITTER INSTITUTE - RESIDENTIAL SERVICES CORPORATION
